name: Whirlpool Hero
description:
Gameplay:

Reach the whirlpool checkpoints by using the bubbles to breathe along the way. Solve puzzles to move the bubbles into better positions.

Controls:

Left click to move

Mouse to rotate

Team:

Art: Molly, Eesta

Code: Alex Xing, Colin, Tom Kun

Design: Max Mao, Alex Xing

Coach: Tom Kun
